Sentencas: The solid oxide electrolysis cell (SOEC) has attracted increased attention in recent years due to its capability to reduce CO2 emissions in a highly efficient and environmentally sustainable fashion.
Titulo: A-site deficient perovskite with nano-socketed Ni-Fe alloy particles as highly active and durable catalyst for high-temperature CO2 electrolysis

Sentencas: Previous work in our group has fabricated an A-site Ce doped La0.7Sr0.3Cr0.5Fe0.5O3-delta (LSCrF) with gadolinium doped ceria (GDC) as the cathode material in SOEC by the conventional method.
Titulo: A-site deficient perovskite with nano-socketed Ni-Fe alloy particles as highly active and durable catalyst for high-temperature CO2 electrolysis

Sentencas: This composite cathode presents a satisfying electrochemical performance and good stability due to the presence of excessive oxygen vacancies and strong CO2 adsorption ability.
Titulo: A-site deficient perovskite with nano-socketed Ni-Fe alloy particles as highly active and durable catalyst for high-temperature CO2 electrolysis

Sentencas: However, its electrochemical catalytic activity is still limited by the catalyst specific area.
Titulo: A-site deficient perovskite with nano-socketed Ni-Fe alloy particles as highly active and durable catalyst for high-temperature CO2 electrolysis

Sentencas: Hence, the optimization of electrode microstructure is considered as a promising way to further improve the SOEC performance by increasing the active reaction area.
Titulo: A-site deficient perovskite with nano-socketed Ni-Fe alloy particles as highly active and durable catalyst for high-temperature CO2 electrolysis

Sentencas: In this study, highly active (La0.65Sr0.3Ce0.05)(0.9)(Cr0.5Fe0.5)(0.85)Ni0.15O3-delta (Ni-LSCeCrF)/GDC nanostructured cathode was successfully fabricated by incorporating infiltration and in situ exsolution processes.
Titulo: A-site deficient perovskite with nano-socketed Ni-Fe alloy particles as highly active and durable catalyst for high-temperature CO2 electrolysis

Sentencas: The optimized microstructure contains fine and uniformly distributed perovskite particles on GDC backbone with nano-socketed Ni-Fe alloy nanoparticles.
Titulo: A-site deficient perovskite with nano-socketed Ni-Fe alloy particles as highly active and durable catalyst for high-temperature CO2 electrolysis

Sentencas: The Ni-LSCeCrF/GDC cathode shows significantly improved electrochemical performance, CO production rate, and Faraday efficiency for CO2 reduction reaction.
Titulo: A-site deficient perovskite with nano-socketed Ni-Fe alloy particles as highly active and durable catalyst for high-temperature CO2 electrolysis

Sentencas: Furthermore, the density functional theory calculations show that Ni doping could reduce the segregation energy of Fe, revealing a new strategy of multiple elements doping to form active alloy by in situ exsolution.
Titulo: A-site deficient perovskite with nano-socketed Ni-Fe alloy particles as highly active and durable catalyst for high-temperature CO2 electrolysis
